titles.title: Temporary Judgeship Conversion Act of 2017
Temporary Judgeship Conversion Act of 2017
A bill to provide for the conversion of temporary judgeships to permanent judgeships, and for other purposes.
Temporary Judgeship Conversion Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Temporary Judgeship Conversion Act of 2017
This bill converts certain temporary U.S. district court judgeships to permanent judgeships in specified U.S. judicial districts in Arizona, California, Florida, Kansas, Missouri, New Mexico, North Carolina, and Texas.
